title: Bucks Co. murders update & Will OJ Simpson go free?
itunes:title: Bucks Co. murders update & Will OJ Simpson go free?
description:
Horrific details emerge in the murders of 4 Pennsylvania men, but prosecutors have reportedly taken the death penalty off the table in exchange for info from a suspect about where he buried the bodies. Reporter Jamie Stover and forensics expert Joseph Scott Morgan discuss the case with Nancy Grace. Cheryl Kane, whose book details how police think OJ Simpson carried out a double homicide, talks about the possibility Simpson will soon be freed from prison.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
